entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
